Protocols/BTDropInControllerDelegate.htm.name: -editPaymentMethods:
Protocols/BTDropInControllerDelegate.htm.abstract: Show the edit screen for payment methods.

Enums/BTDropInColorScheme.html#/c:@E@BTD.name: BTDropInColorSchemeDynamic
Enums/BTDropInColorScheme.html#/c:@E@BTD.abstract: Light or dark color palette, depending on the user’s light or dark mode system preference. Only available in iOS 13+.

Enums/BTDropInErrorType.html#/c:@E@BTDro.name: BTDropInErrorTypeAuthorization
Enums/BTDropInErrorType.html#/c:@E@BTDro.abstract: The client token or tokenization key is invalid

Classes/BTDropInUICustomization.html#/c:.name: -initWithColorScheme:
Classes/BTDropInUICustomization.html#/c:.abstract: Creates an instance of BTDropInUICustomization with the given color scheme.

Classes/BTDropInUICustomization.html#/c:.name: overlayColor
Classes/BTDropInUICustomization.html#/c:.abstract: Fallback color for the overlay if blur is disabled

Classes/BTDropInUICustomization.html#/c:.name: fontFamily
Classes/BTDropInUICustomization.html#/c:.abstract: Font family. When not set, system font will be used.

Classes/BTDropInUICustomization.html#/c:.name: boldFontFamily
Classes/BTDropInUICustomization.html#/c:.abstract: Bold font family. When not set, bold system font will be used.

Classes/BTDropInUICustomization.html#/c:.name: postalCodeFormFieldKeyboardType
Classes/BTDropInUICustomization.html#/c:.abstract: The keyboard the postal code field should use

Classes/BTDropInUICustomization.html#/c:.name: switchOnTintColor
Classes/BTDropInUICustomization.html#/c:.abstract: Tint color for UISwitch when in the on position

Classes/BTDropInUICustomization.html#/c:.name: keyboardAppearance
Classes/BTDropInUICustomization.html#/c:.abstract: Appearance style of keyboards associated with text fields

Classes/BTDropInUICustomization.html#/c:.name: disableDynamicType
Classes/BTDropInUICustomization.html#/c:.abstract: Defaults to false. Disabling this feature is highly discouraged, as it prevents users from adjusting Drop-in’s text size to fit their needs.

Classes/BTDropInResult.html#/c:objc(cs)B.name: canceled
Classes/BTDropInResult.html#/c:objc(cs)B.abstract: True if the modal was dismissed without selecting a payment method

Classes/BTDropInResult.html#/c:objc(cs)B.name: paymentIcon
Classes/BTDropInResult.html#/c:objc(cs)B.abstract: A UIView (BTUIKPaymentOptionCardView) that represents the payment option

Classes/BTDropInResult.html#/c:objc(cs)B.name: +mostRecentPaymentMethodForClientToken:completion:
Classes/BTDropInResult.html#/c:objc(cs)B.abstract: Fetch a BTDropInResult with the customer’s most recently vaulted payment method.

Classes/BTDropInRequest.html#/c:objc(cs).name: payPalRequest
Classes/BTDropInRequest.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Optional: Specify the options for the PayPal flow using either BTPayPalCheckoutRequest or BTPayPalVaultRequest. If not present, a default vault flow will be used.

Classes/BTDropInRequest.html#/c:objc(cs).name: venmoRequest
Classes/BTDropInRequest.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Optional: Specify the options for the Venmo flow. If not present, a default vault flow will be used.

Classes/BTDropInRequest.html#/c:objc(cs).name: applePayDisabled
Classes/BTDropInRequest.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Optional: Use this parameter to disable Apple Pay. Otherwise if Apple Pay is correctly configured, Apple Pay will appear as a selection in the Payment Method options.

Classes/BTDropInRequest.html#/c:objc(cs).name: paypalDisabled
Classes/BTDropInRequest.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Defaults to false. Set to true to hide the PayPal option even if enabled for your account.

Classes/BTDropInRequest.html#/c:objc(cs).name: venmoDisabled
Classes/BTDropInRequest.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Defaults to false. Set to true to hide the Venmo option even if enabled for your account.

Classes/BTDropInRequest.html#/c:objc(cs).name: cardDisabled
Classes/BTDropInRequest.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Defaults to false. Set to true to hide the Card option even if enabled for your account.

Classes/BTDropInRequest.html#/c:objc(cs).name: threeDSecureRequest
Classes/BTDropInRequest.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Optional: Enable 3DS verification and specify options and additional information.

Classes/BTDropInRequest.html#/c:objc(cs).name: cardholderNameSetting
Classes/BTDropInRequest.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Optional: Determines the visibility and input requirements of the cardholder name field.

Classes/BTDropInRequest.html#/c:objc(cs).name: shouldMaskSecurityCode
Classes/BTDropInRequest.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Optional: If true the security code will be masked.

Classes/BTDropInRequest.html#/c:objc(cs).name: vaultManager
Classes/BTDropInRequest.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Optional: If true, enables the managment UI.

Classes/BTDropInRequest.html#/c:objc(cs).name: vaultCard
Classes/BTDropInRequest.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Optional: Whether or not to vault the card upon tokenization, can only be applied when initializing the Braintree client with a client token that was generated with a customer ID. When set to false with allowVaultCardOverride set to false, then cards will not be vaulted.

Classes/BTDropInRequest.html#/c:objc(cs).name: allowVaultCardOverride
Classes/BTDropInRequest.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Optional: When true, the card form will include an option to let the customer decide not to vault the card.

Classes/BTDropInRequest.html#/c:objc(cs).name: uiCustomization
Classes/BTDropInRequest.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Optional: Customization options for Braintree Drop-in’s user interface.

Classes/BTDropInLocalization.html#/c:obj.name: +setCustomTranslations:
Classes/BTDropInLocalization.html#/c:obj.abstract: Sets custom translation locales for the Drop-In UI

Classes/BTDropInController.html#/c:objc(.name: apiClient
Classes/BTDropInController.html#/c:objc(.abstract: The API client used for communication with Braintree servers.

Classes/BTDropInController.html.name: BTDropInController
Classes/BTDropInController.html.abstract: The primary UIViewController for Drop-In. BTDropInController will manage the other UIViewControllers and return a BTDropInResult.

Classes/BTDropInUICustomization.html.name: BTDropInUICustomization
Classes/BTDropInUICustomization.html.abstract: Options for customizing Braintree Drop-in’s user interface.

Type%20Definitions.html.name: Type Definitions
Type%20Definitions.html.abstract: The following type definitions are available globally.
